wikipedia_page.main: Daniel Hipgrave (born 5 August 1975) is an English musician and writer, best known as the guitarist of the Post-Britpop/alternative rock band Toploader.

response: *1975 – Dan Hipgrave, English guitarist and journalist

Porter married Toploader guitarist Dan Hipgrave in August 2001 and gave birth to their daughter Honey on 3 September 2002. She said in February 2005 that they had separated eight months earlier. Before they met, Porter was in a relationship with Keith Flint, vocalist from The Prodigy.
The present band line-up contains three of the five original members: Joseph Washbourn, Dan Hipgrave and Rob Green.

link_mentions.page: List of Never Mind the Buzzcocks episodes

response: Following her marriage to Toploader guitarist Dan Hipgrave in November 2008 she became known as Lynsey Hipgrave. She is a Newcastle United supporter.
* Episode 2 (16 February 2003) – Guests: Gail Porter and Dan Hipgrave
